name: Dittaya Wanvarie
content: Dittaya Wanvarie Dittaya Wanvarie My research interests are mainly in natural language processing and information retrieval. However, I'm also active in designing solution architectures on a public cloud. Contact Office Room 1309/22 Mahavajirunhis Bld. Department of Mathematics and Computer Science, Faculty of Science, Chulalongkorn university, Thailand. 10300. Email Dittaya dot W at chula dot ac dot th CV CV Courses Present 2301357/2302794 Architecting on the cloud Archives 2301494 Special Topics in Computer Science II. (Deep learning) 2301371 Operating Systems. 2017 2301552 Principles of Data Structures and Algorithms 2016 2301170 Computer and Programming. (Python programming) 2016 2301491 Special Topics in Computer Science. (Machine learning) 2014-2015 2301274 Computer Systems. 2013,2015-2016 2301379 Theory of Computation. 2012-2015 2301170 Computer and Programming.
